entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
